daily_activities: Morning Hike at Kuang Si Falls in Laos
Visit the Royal Palace Museum in Luang Prabang
Nightlife at the Walking Street in Luang Prabang
Rock Climbing in Railay Beach, Thailand
Dining at a local restaurant in Krabi Town
Shopping at the Krabi Night Market
Sightseeing at the ancient city of Angkor Wat in Cambodia
Visit the National Museum of Cambodia in Phnom Penh
Adventure Sports: Quad Bike tour in the countryside
Hiking to the top of Mount Kinabalu in Malaysia
Visit the Sabah Museum in Kota Kinabalu
Dining at a seafood restaurant in Kota Kinabalu
Snorkeling or Scuba Diving in the Perhentian Islands, Malaysia
Shopping at the Kota Kinabalu Handicraft Market
Nightlife at a beach bar in the Perhentian Islands
Sightseeing at the Ha Long Bay in Vietnam
Visit the Vietnam Museum of Ethnology in Hanoi
Dining at a street food stall in Hanoi's Old Quarter

travel_instructions.route_details: From Ahmedabad, take a flight from Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel International Airport (AMD) to major airports in South East Asia such as Singapore Changi Airport (SIN), Bangkok Suvarnabhumi Airport (BKK), or Kuala Lumpur International Airport (KUL), with possible layovers depending on the airline and route.
